short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Zee is a Chrome plug-in that shows you your to-do items every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Zee is a Chrome plug-in that shows you your to-do items every time you open a new tab. This helps you focus on the tasks that needs your attention and avoid distractions like habitually opening Facebook or YouTube to watch yet another cat video.
